author: cryptomachine7785
content: Hi everybody I'm really new to cryptocurrency and I want to know if there's any wallets for Eth such as yoroi for cardano.

author: ghosts_in_the_code
content: In solidity, you write in solidity and it compiles to evm bytecode

author: ghosts_in_the_code
content: Not really, it's a standard. There are changes you're allowed to do while following the standard

author: ghosts_in_the_code
content: Otherwise you can write contracts that don't follow the standard

author: clearlight1596
content: <@!291925846556540928> <@!488328812501663744>  Could you tell me how can i find ERC20 and ERC721 contract address in main net?

author: ghosts_in_the_code
content:
ERC20 is a standard for contracts not a contract in itself. For instance here is the DAI ERC20 contract.
https://etherscan.io/address/0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f#code

author: clearlight1596
content: Much appriciate for your kind suggestion.
